product_name: Hiking the Carolina Mountains: 57 Great Day Hikes in North and South Carolina
long_description: This guide includes 57 day hikes ranging in length from 2 to 13 miles. Author: Danny Bernstein. Softcover; 358 pages; black-and-white photos and maps. Milestone Press; copyright 2007. Each entry covers everything you need to know to get out and hike; maps and detailed directions, mileage, elevation gain and trail highlights. Also includes fees and hiking regulations, films and novels set in each location and more. Destinations include, but are not limited to, the waterfalls of Dupont Sate Forest and The Blue Ridge parkway's beautiful Craggy Gardens. Also includes the ruins of George Vanderbilt's palatial Buck Spring hunting lodge on Mt. Pisgah and the summit of Cold Mountain.
short_description: This guide includes 57 day hikes ranging in length from 2 to 13 miles.
